about.title: About Norfolk Pressure Washing
about.subtitle: Serving our community of Norfolk County.
text: We live and operate in Norfolk. It's where we have built and continue to build our community. We take pride in each neighbour we serve.
We only use water and green cleaners. This allows us to remove organics like mold, algae, mildew and surface dirt without polluting our eco system and damaging your home with harsh chemicals.
about.quote: This all started at our home, then it grew to our family and friends. Now we are serving our entire community.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We pride ourselves on the services we offer
text: Browse the available services we have to offer, if you don't see something reach out and we will be happy to help.

services.name: High pressure washing
services.text: Perfect for stone, brick, cement pads, and driveways. Removes winter grim.

services.name: Low pressure washing
services.text: For siding, vinyl, painted material, and general purposes around your home.

services.name: Deck and fence cleaning
services.text: Gently scrub and wash away all the hard to remove dirt and grim that naturally attracts to wood surfaces.

services.name: Gutter cleaning
services.text: A maintenance that is highly recommended for all home owners.

services.name: Deck and fence prep
services.text: Remove all dirt and grim from the top layer of your deck or fence to get ready for sealing or refinishing.

services.name: Exterior home detailing
services.text: Bring life back to your home and help prevent bugs and pests with a deep exterior clean.

services.name: Curb appeal detailing
services.text: Make your house shine from the road all the way to your front steps.

faq.title: Faq
faq.subtitle: Want more details?
text: Here are some frequently asked questions

questions.question: What do you need from me?
questions.answer: Our technician needs access to a standard water outlet so we ask home owners to check that their outside water outlet is clear and in working order before our scheduled cleaning. In addition we ask to remove any and all items off of the spaces to be cleaned.

questions.question: Do you use bleach or any other harsh chemicals?
questions.answer: No. We only use water and green rated cleaners which are pet-safe and plant-safe. We don't want to harm your home or environment.

questions.question: Do you do commercial or agricultural?
questions.answer: We love to serve our community but currently we only offer services to residential properties.

questions.question: Can you remove oil stains or rust spots?
questions.answer: We only remove organic material and surface stains.

questions.question: Do you offer any discounts or promotional offers?
questions.answer: We will send out occasional offers or discounts so sign up on our email list to get them direct!
